title: The Pinkertons
resume: Set in a young America still reeling from the Civil War, The Pinkertons follows Allan PInkerton—founder of Pinkerton's National Detective Agency— his son, William, and America’s first female detective, Kate Warne, as they solve crimes throughout the “Wild West” of the 1860s.
